body.p: The set of Oxygen XML related products has expanded over the years. It is helpful to have a general understanding of the functionality we offer and what each of these products can do. I enjoyed the presentation by George Bina titled Use-cases using the Oxygen XML tools at Convex Baltimore 2023. It provided an overview of all our products. I am embedding it below for our clients and integrators to also have a general understanding of our products' ecosystem.
